nodes.text: Riboga's Legacy is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 4, 2004 and form of a broadcast by new "Eye on Cularin" host Ryk Osentay as he tried to interview citizens in Tolea Biqua about the legacy of Riboga the Hutt. While doing so, Melanda Forswoth, who had been kidnapped a year earlier, stumbled past and was recovered by the news crew. Her recovery was then reported by Yara Grugara and Osentay.
